oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ipso-Nitration of Arylboronic Acids with Bismuth Nitrate and Perdisulfate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANNA, S
MAITY, S
RANA, S
AGASTI, S
MAITI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ELECTROPHILIC AROMATIC-SUBSTITUTION
FLUORINATION
SALTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient and one pot synthetic method of ipso-nitration of arylboronic acids has been developed. The high efficiency, general applicability, and broader substrate scope including heterocycles and functional groups make this method advantageous. Due to its simplicity, we expect to find application of this method in synthesis.
